quotes.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including YOU.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation.
I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong.
I don't want to be alone. I want to be left alone.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Men aren't necessities. They're luxuries.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
As I step off at the surface at Taurus-Littrow, I'd like to dedicate the first step of Apollo 17 to all those who made it possible.
Truth exists. Only falsehood has to be invented.
I will never be a well-behaved woman.
The secret to using power is not to use it. Just having it is enough.
What doesn't kill us gives us a lot of unhealthy coping mechanisms and a really dark sense of humor.
Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
Keep only those things that speak to your heart. Then take the plunge and discard all the rest. By doing this, you can reset your life and embark on a new lifestyle.
Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
If we surrendered to earth’s intelligence, we could rise up rooted like trees.
Sweet as sugar, hard as ice. Hurt me once, I'll kill you twice.
People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
A Taurus always appears to be calm and steady even when they feel like punching in the face.
The tighter you try to hold on to a taurus the more they will slip through your fingers.
A taurus will resent you for years if you do not apologize to them for being wrong and absolutely proclaim that they were right all along.
I can't stand to see red in my profit-or-loss column. I'm Taurus the bull, so I react to red. If I see it, I sell my stocks quickly.
Taureans are stubborn as hell. They never want to tell you what sign they are.... But underneath that tough Taurus hide beats the heart of a hopeless romantic.
